Instance.description: The situation to control dining group. It will control the state of the whole group like arrival, order, etc.

TunableVariant.name: _diner_arrival_state
TunableVariant.description: If enabled then this will place all sims in the arrival state to begin with. If not then the arrival state will be skipped and

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The state when a dining group first arrives the lot. They will wait to be hosted, or claim a table directly. The state will transit to order state when a table is claimed.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _diner_eat_state
TunableTuple.description: The state that all the dining group Sims are eating the food.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _diner_leave_state
TunableTuple.description: The state handles the pay bill process or they finished eating and decides to leave.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _diner_order_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for the dining group to order food. They can either sit at the table and order food from waiter, or wait in line to order food. The state will switch to eat state when the table order is delivered, or last sim in the group finished their order and get the food from the chef station.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: allow_preroll
Tunable.description:
If set to True then this situation may advance past arrival on preroll. If false then this situation must go through the normal flow every time.
This should mainly be used to keep user situations from prerolling.

Tunable.name: blacklist_job
Tunable.description: The default job used for blacklisting Sims from coming back as Diners right away.

TunableVariant.name: group_filter
TunableVariant.description: If enabled allows the tuning of an Aggregate Group Filter for who should be involved with this group. If disabled then no Sims will be added to the group by default. This is probably only desirable for user sims situations where the guest list is being created by another process.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The group filter for these Sims. This filter is what will setup the Sims that need to spawn in. The value of the tags will determine what sub situation the Sim will end up in.

Tunable.name: group_rel_bit
Tunable.description: The short term relationship bit that get's added to all of the Sims in a dining group to help encourage them to socialize with each other.

TunableList.name: situation_job_mapping
TunableList.description:
A mapping of filter term tag to situation job.
The filter term tag is returned as part of the sim filters used to create the guest list for this particular background situation.
The situation job is the job that the Sim will be assigned to in the background situation.

TunableEnum.name: filter_tag
TunableEnum.description: The filter term tag returned with the filter results.

Tunable.name: job
Tunable.description: The job the Sim will receive when added to the background situation.

TunableList.name: sub_situation_mapping
TunableList.description:
A mapping from Job to Sub Situation.
The job is the job that the Sim is beign given in the background situation.
the sub situation is the individual sub situation that will be used to control the behavior of the Sim in the background situation. The background situation will request the different phases of the sub situations to affect change in the Sims behavior.

Tunable.name: job
Tunable.description: The job the Sim is being added to in the background situation.

Tunable.name: sub_situation
Tunable.description: The sub situation that will be created for the Sim when they are given the job that is the corresponding key value.
